```{r setup, collapse = TRUE}
library(microCTr)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```

```{r read-data, collapse = TRUE}
key <- read_key_csv(here::here("data", "key.csv"))

trab <- read_trabecular_csv(here::here("data", "trabecular.csv"), key)

cort <- read_cortical_csv(here::here("data", "twice1.csv"), 
                          here::here("data", "twice2.csv"), 
                          key)

mfe <- read_mfe_csv(here::here("data", "mfe.csv"), key)
```

# Femoral Metaphysis

## Trabecular {.tabset}

### Results

```{r results = "asis"}
F.Met.Tb <- trab |> 
    filter(Site == "Met")

F.Met.Tb_res <- compare_genotypes(F.Met.Tb)
print_results(F.Met.Tb_res)
```

### Data

```{r results = "asis"}
print_data(F.Met.Tb)
```

### Combined Sexes

```{r results = "asis"}
F.Met.Tb |> 
    mutate(Sex = "B") |> 
    compare_genotypes() |> 
    print_results()
```

### Plots

```{r fig.width = 5}
plot_genotypes(F.Met.Tb) |> print_plots()
```
